alert.note: Alert for Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Far Southern Redwood... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Overflow of water will result in minor flooding of poor drainage locations in the area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Walnut Grove, Lamberton, Sanborn and Revere.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
